org.scribe.oauth

Class StateOAuth20ServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scribe.oauth.OAuth20ServiceImpl
      • org.scribe.oauth.ProxyOAuth20ServiceImpl
        • org.scribe.oauth.StateOAuth20ServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.scribe.oauth.OAuthService, StateOAuth20Service
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinkedInOAuth20ServiceImpl

    public class StateOAuth20ServiceImpl
extends ProxyOAuth20ServiceImpl
implements StateOAuth20Service
    This class overload getAuthorizationUrl method to allow to add the state parameter to authorization url.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Mehdi BEN HAJ ABBES
